lib/api\api_checker.dart-class ApiChecker {
lib/api\api_checker.dart-  Future<Response> checkApi(
lib/api\api_checker.dart-      {required http.Response respons,
lib/api\api_checker.dart-      bool showUserError = true,
lib/api\api_checker.dart-      bool showSystemError = true}) async {
lib/api\api_checker.dart-    dynamic responseBody;
lib/api\api_checker.dart-    try {
lib/api\api_checker.dart-// print(respons.body);
lib/api\api_checker.dart-      // Try to parse as JSON first
lib/api\api_checker.dart-      responseBody = jsonDecode(respons.body);
lib/api\api_checker.dart-    } catch (e) {
lib/api\api_checker.dart-      // If JSON parsing fails, use the raw body
lib/api\api_checker.dart-// print("Response is not valid JSON, status code: ${respons.statusCode}");
lib/api\api_checker.dart-// print("Response headers: ${respons.headers}");
lib/api\api_checker.dart-// print(
lib/api\api_checker.dart-          "Response body (first 500 chars): ${respons.body.length > 500 ? respons.body.substring(0, 500) + '...' : respons.body}");
lib/api\api_checker.dart-      responseBody = respons.body;
lib/api\api_checker.dart-    }
lib/api\api_checker.dart-
lib/api\api_checker.dart-    dynamic response = Response(
lib/api\api_checker.dart-      body: responseBody,
lib/api\api_checker.dart-      bodyString: respons.body.toString(),
lib/api\api_checker.dart-      request: Request(
lib/api\api_checker.dart-          headers: respons.request!.headers,
lib/api\api_checker.dart-          method: respons.request!.method,
lib/api\api_checker.dart-          url: respons.request!.url),
lib/api\api_checker.dart-      headers: respons.headers,
lib/api\api_checker.dart-      statusCode: respons.statusCode,
lib/api\api_checker.dart-      statusText: respons.reasonPhrase,
lib/api\api_checker.dart-    );
lib/api\api_checker.dart-// print(response.body);
lib/api\api_checker.dart-// print("status code: ${response.statusCode}");
lib/api\api_checker.dart-    if (response == null) {
lib/api\api_checker.dart-      if (showSystemError) {
lib/api\api_checker.dart-// print('Check your internet connection and try again');
lib/api\api_checker.dart-      }

lib/view\constants\premium_performance.dart-  /// Track individual frame performance
lib/view\constants\premium_performance.dart-  void _trackFrame(Duration timeStamp) {

lib/view\constants\premium_performance.dart-      final frameDuration = timeStamp - _lastFrameTime!;

lib/view\constants\premium_performance.dart-
lib/view\constants\premium_performance.dart-      _frameTimes.add(fps);

lib/view\constants\premium_performance.dart-      }
lib/view\constants\premium_performance.dart-
lib/view\constants\premium_performance.dart-      _averageFPS = _frameTimes.fold<double>(0, (sum, fps) => sum + fps) / _frameTimes.length;
lib/view\constants\premium_performance.dart-
lib/view\constants\premium_performance.dart-      // Add frame metric
lib/view\constants\premium_performance.dart-      final frameMetric = FrameMetric(

lib/view\constants\premium_performance.dart-        fps: fps,
lib/view\constants\premium_performance.dart-        frameDuration: frameDuration,
lib/view\constants\premium_performance.dart-      );
lib/view\constants\premium_performance.dart-
lib/view\constants\premium_performance.dart-      _frameMetrics.add(frameMetric);

lib/view\constants\premium_error_handler.dart-/// Premium error handling system with intelligent recovery and user-friendly messaging
lib/view\constants\premium_error_handler.dart-class PremiumErrorHandler {
lib/view\constants\premium_error_handler.dart-  static const int maxRetryAttempts = 3;
lib/view\constants\premium_error_handler.dart-  static const Duration retryDelay = Duration(seconds: 2);
lib/view\constants\premium_error_handler.dart-
lib/view\constants\premium_error_handler.dart-  /// Handle API errors with intelligent retry logic
lib/view\constants\premium_error_handler.dart-  static Future<T?> handleApiCall<T>({
lib/view\constants\premium_error_handler.dart-    required Future<T> Function() apiCall,
lib/view\constants\premium_error_handler.dart-    String? customMessage,
lib/view\constants\premium_error_handler.dart-    bool showSnackbar = true,
lib/view\constants\premium_error_handler.dart-    int maxRetries = maxRetryAttempts,
lib/view\constants\premium_error_handler.dart-  }) async {
lib/view\constants\premium_error_handler.dart-    int attempts = 0;
lib/view\constants\premium_error_handler.dart-    Exception? lastException;
lib/view\constants\premium_error_handler.dart-

lib/shared_prefs_fix.dart-Future<void> initializeSharedPreferences() async {
lib/shared_prefs_fix.dart-  late SharedPreferences prefs;
lib/shared_prefs_fix.dart-  // First try using global instance
lib/shared_prefs_fix.dart-  if (globalPrefs != null) {
lib/shared_prefs_fix.dart-    prefs = globalPrefs!;
lib/shared_prefs_fix.dart-// print('âœ… SharedPreferences initialized from global instance');
lib/shared_prefs_fix.dart-    return;
lib/shared_prefs_fix.dart-  }
lib/shared_prefs_fix.dart-
lib/shared_prefs_fix.dart-  int retries = 5; // Increased retries for real devices
lib/shared_prefs_fix.dart-  while (retries > 0) {
lib/shared_prefs_fix.dart-    try {
lib/shared_prefs_fix.dart-      // Add a delay before initialization to ensure platform channels are ready
lib/shared_prefs_fix.dart-      if (Platform.isIOS) {

lib/ensure_background_service.dart-  static Future<void> ensureServiceRunning(String userId) async {

lib/ensure_background_service.dart-

lib/ensure_background_service.dart-        });

lib/ensure_background_service.dart-      }
lib/ensure_background_service.dart-    } catch (e) {

lib/ensure_background_service.dart-    }

lib/ensure_background_service.dart-
lib/ensure_background_service.dart-      // Start it again

lib/ensure_background_service.dart-        'userId': userId,

lib/Services\push_service.dart-      });

lib/Services\push_service.dart-      });

lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-  // Method to apply client-side price filtering
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-  List<ListingModel> applyPriceFilter(List<ListingModel> listings) {

lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-    }
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-    double? minPrice;
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-    double? maxPrice;

lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-    if (minPriceText.isNotEmpty) {

lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-        minPrice = double.parse(minPriceText);
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-      } catch (e) {
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-        Get.log("Invalid min price format: $minPriceText");
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-      }
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-    }
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-    // Parse max price
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-    if (maxPriceText.isNotEmpty) {
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-      try {
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-        maxPrice = double.parse(maxPriceText);
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-      } catch (e) {
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-        Get.log("Invalid max price format: $maxPriceText");
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-      }
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-    }
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-    // Filter listings based on price

lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-      try {
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-        listingPrice = double.parse(listing.price ?? '0');
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-      } catch (e) {

lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-      }

lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-        return false;
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-      }
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-      // Check max price constraint
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-      if (maxPrice != null && listingPrice > maxPrice) {

lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-      }

lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-      return true;

lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-  List<ListingModel> applyCategoryFilter(List<ListingModel> listings) {

lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-    if (selectedCategory == null &&
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-        selectedSubCategory == null &&

lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-    }
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-    return listings.where((listing) {

lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-        bool matches = listing.subSubCategory?.id == selectedSubSubCategory?.id;

lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-            "SubSubCategory filter: ${listing.title} - Expected: ${selectedSubSubCategory?.id}, Got: ${listing.subSubCategory?.id}, Match: $matches");

lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-      }

lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-            listing.subCategory?.id == selectedSubCategory?.id;
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-        // Check if post belongs to a sub-subcategory under this subcategory
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-        bool subSubCategoryMatch = false;

lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-          try {

lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-            subSubCategoryMatch =
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-                subSubCategoryParentId == selectedSubCategory?.id;
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-          } catch (e) {
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-            Get.log("Error parsing subCategoryId: $e");
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-          }
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-        }
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-        bool matches = directSubCategoryMatch || subSubCategoryMatch;
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-        Get.log(
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-            "SubCategory filter: ${listing.title} - Expected SubCategory: ${selectedSubCategory?.id}, Got SubCategory: ${listing.subCategory?.id}, Got SubSubCategory Parent: ${listing.subSubCategory?.subCategoryId}, Direct Match: $directSubCategoryMatch, SubSub Match: $subSubCategoryMatch, Final Match: $matches");
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-        return matches;
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-      }
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-      // Check main category
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-      if (selectedCategory != null) {
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-        bool matches = listing.category?.id == selectedCategory?.id;
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-        Get.log(

lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-  Future<bool> removeAllFavouriteListings() async {
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-    try {
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-      // Create a list of all item IDs to remove
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-      List<String> itemIds = userFavouriteListingModelList
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-          .map((item) => item.itemId ?? "")

lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-          .toList();
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-      if (itemIds.isEmpty) {
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-        return true; // Nothing to remove
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-      }
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-      // Make ALL API calls concurrently for super fast deletion
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-      List<Future<bool>> futures = itemIds.map((itemId) async {

lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-          Response response =
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-              await api.postWithForm("api/favouriteItem", {'item_id': itemId},
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-                  headers: {
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-                    'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=UTF-8',
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-                    'Accept': 'application/json',
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-                    'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': "*",
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-                    'Authorization': 'Bearer ${authCont.user?.accessToken}'
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-                  },
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-                  showdialog: false);
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-          if (response.statusCode == 200) {
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-            return true;
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-          } else {
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-            return false;
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-          }
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-        } catch (e) {
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-          return false;
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-        }
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-      }).toList();
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-      // Wait for ALL requests to complete simultaneously
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-      List<bool> results = await Future.wait(futures);
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-      int successCount = results.where((success) => success).length;

lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-      userFavouriteListingModelList.clear();

lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-      return successCount > 0; // Return true if at least one was removed
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-    } catch (e) {
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-      return false;
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-    }
lib/Controllers\home_controller.dart-  }

lib/Controllers\auth_controller.dart-              Duration(seconds: 10)),
lib/Controllers\auth_controller.dart-        );
lib/Controllers\auth_controller.dart-
lib/Controllers\auth_controller.dart-        // Test the connection with a simple operation
lib/Controllers\auth_controller.dart-        try {
lib/Controllers\auth_controller.dart-          await prefs.getString('test');
lib/Controllers\auth_controller.dart-        } catch (e) {

lib/Controllers\auth_controller.dart-        return;
lib/Controllers\auth_controller.dart-      } catch (e) {
lib/Controllers\auth_controller.dart-        retries--;
lib/Controllers\auth_controller.dart-// print(
lib/Controllers\auth_controller.dart-            'âš ï¸ SharedPreferences initialization failed, retries left: $retries, error: $e');
lib/Controllers\auth_controller.dart-        if (retries > 0) {
lib/Controllers\auth_controller.dart-          // Exponential backoff with longer delays
lib/Controllers\auth_controller.dart-          await Future.delayed(Duration(milliseconds: 1000 * (4 - retries)));
lib/Controllers\auth_controller.dart-        } else {
lib/Controllers\auth_controller.dart-          throw Exception(
lib/Controllers\auth_controller.dart-              'Failed to initialize SharedPreferences after 3 attempts: $e');
lib/Controllers\auth_controller.dart-        }

lib/main.dart-Future<void> initializeSharedPreferences() async {
lib/main.dart-  if (globalPrefs != null) return;
lib/main.dart-
lib/main.dart-  int maxRetries = 5;
lib/main.dart-  for (int i = 0; i < maxRetries; i++) {
lib/main.dart-    try {
lib/main.dart-      // Add platform-specific delay for iOS
lib/main.dart-      if (Platform.isIOS) {
lib/main.dart-        // Wait for platform channels to be fully established
lib/main.dart-        await Future.delayed(Duration(milliseconds: 100 * (i + 1)));
lib/main.dart-

lib/main.dart-        const platform = MethodChannel('plugins.flutter.io/shared_preferences');
lib/main.dart-        try {
lib/main.dart-          await platform.invokeMethod('getAll');
lib/main.dart-        } catch (e) {
lib/main.dart-// print('Platform channel not ready, attempt ${i + 1}/$maxRetries');
lib/main.dart-          if (i < maxRetries - 1) continue;
lib/main.dart-        }
lib/main.dart-      }
lib/main.dart-
lib/main.dart-      globalPrefs = await SharedPreferences.getInstance();
lib/main.dart-
lib/main.dart-      // Verify it's working
lib/main.dart-      await globalPrefs!.reload();
lib/main.dart-
lib/main.dart-// print('âœ… SharedPreferences initialized successfully on attempt ${i + 1}');
lib/main.dart-      return;
lib/main.dart-    } catch (e) {
lib/main.dart-// print('âš ï¸ SharedPreferences init attempt ${i + 1} failed: $e');
lib/main.dart-      if (i == maxRetries - 1) {
lib/main.dart-// print(
lib/main.dart-            'âŒ Failed to initialize SharedPreferences after $maxRetries attempts');

lib/main.dart-  @override
lib/main.dart-  void didChangeAppLifecycleState(AppLifecycleState state) {

lib/main.dart-    final isInForeground = state == AppLifecycleState.resumed;
lib/main.dart-    PushService.setAppLifecycleState(isInForeground);
lib/main.dart-

lib/main.dart-      _restoreServiceNotification();
lib/main.dart-    } else if (state == AppLifecycleState.paused ||
lib/main.dart-        state == AppLifecycleState.detached) {

lib/main.dart-        final authCont = Get.find<AuthController>();
lib/main.dart-        if (authCont.user?.userId != null) {

lib/main.dart-              ? Get.find<SupabaseChatController>()
lib/main.dart-              : Get.put(SupabaseChatController(), permanent: true);
lib/main.dart-          chatCont.setUserOffline(authCont.user!.userId.toString());
lib/main.dart-        }
lib/main.dart-      } catch (e) {
lib/main.dart-// print('Error setting user offline: $e');
lib/main.dart-      }
lib/main.dart-    }
lib/main.dart-  }

lib/main.dart-    }

lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-  /// Compress image file to reduce size before upload
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-  static Future<File?> compressImage(File imageFile) async {
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-    try {
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-// print('ğŸ–¼ï¸ Original image size: ${await imageFile.length()} bytes');

lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-      }
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-

lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-        'compressed_${DateTime.now().millisecondsSinceEpoch}.jpg',
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-      );
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-      
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-      // Compress the image
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-      XFile? compressedFile = await FlutterImageCompress.compressAndGetFile(

lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-        targetPath,
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-        quality: IMAGE_QUALITY,
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-        minWidth: 1024,

lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-

lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-

lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-    }
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-  }

lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-  /// Validate image file before upload
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-  static Future<bool> validateImage(File imageFile) async {

lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-      // Check file extension
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-      String extension = path.extension(imageFile.path).toLowerCase();

lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-      }
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-      
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-      // Check file size
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-      final fileSize = await imageFile.length();

lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-

lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-      }
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-      
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-// print('âœ… Image validation passed');
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-      return true;

lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-    }

lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-  /// Process multiple images for upload
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-  static Future<List<String>> processImagesForUpload(List<String> imagePaths) async {

lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-

lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-        
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-        // Validate image
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-        bool isValid = await validateImage(imageFile);

lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-// print('âš ï¸ Skipping invalid image: $imagePath');

lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-        }
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-        
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-        // Compress image if needed

lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-          }
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-        }
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-      } catch (e) {

lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-    }

lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-  /// Get file size in human readable format
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-  static String getFileSizeString(int bytes) {
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-    if (bytes <= 0) return "0 B";
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-    const suffixes = ["B", "KB", "MB", "GB"];
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-    var i = 0;
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-    double size = bytes.toDouble();
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-    
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-    while (size > 1024 && i < suffixes.length - 1) {
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-      size /= 1024;
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-      i++;
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-    }
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-    
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-    return "${size.toStringAsFixed(2)} ${suffixes[i]}";
lib/Utils\image_upload_helper.dart-  }
